SentLast24Hours.Documentation: // The number of emails sent during the previous 24 hours.

IdentityDkimAttributes.Documentation: // Represents the DKIM attributes of a verified email address or a domain.

IdentityMailFromDomainAttributes.Documentation:

BounceTopic.Documentation:

ComplaintTopic.Documentation:

MaxItems.Documentation: // The maximum number of identities per page. Possible values are 1-1000 inclusive.

NextToken.Documentation: // The token to use for pagination.
